shopping_map.name: Shopping Map
shopping_map.description: Team university project, the intention of the project is to collect outfits and capsules from clothes, and the picture for the outfit or capsule will be generated automatically.

countries.name: Country Service
countries.description: The service offers comprehensive information about countries worldwide, including their respective capitals, populations, and national flags.

it_quiz_bot.name: IT Quiz Bot
it_quiz_bot.description: IT Quiz Bot is a Telegram bot built using the grammY framework, this bot provides an interactive quiz experience with multiple categories and difficulty levels.

store.name: StoreUz
store.description: The system comprises a straightforward online shop with accounts, balances and products, with separate accounts for the administrator and the buyer.

posts_system.name: Posts System
posts_system.description: A simple post system that allows you to create and store posts in a database, as well as edit and delete them.

weathers.name: Weather API
weathers.description: The Weather API uses to get information about weather and to take advantage of the limited free version of OpenWeatherMap.

many_flowers.name: Many Flowers
many_flowers.description: Minecraft Mod that adds flowers with different abilities and the game is now not so empty and not so boring.

sds.name: Gods Of Olympus
sds.description: Minecraft Mod that made for ModeFest Sky and Sea and adds two gods of Olympus
